page.title: 04GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: The children that live in the village usually get together and play football on the green. They might use their jackets or jumpers as goal posts, or they might play cricket. One of them would probably have a cricket set, most of them are quite good at both sports. They also play on their BMX bikes which are special bikes for doing stunts (wheelies, jumps, etc) They ride them on the green. Sometimes they might go to somebody else's house who doesn't live in Frant probably on their bikes. I usually play on my BMX bike as well, in my garden or along a path at the bottom of my garden. I might go and find a tree to climb (along the path or somewhere.) Note:a BMX is a special bike for doing stunts(jumps,wheelies etc)
